thread.title: 'SNL' imagines a Totino's ad with lesbian lovers
thread.title_full: 'SNL' imagines a Totino's ad with lesbian lovers

author: USA TODAY
title: 'SNL' imagines a Totino's ad with lesbian lovers
text:
'SNL' imagines a Totino's ad with lesbian lovers Carly Mallenbaum , USA TODAY 12:59 p.m. ET Feb. 5, 2017 
Kristen Stewart hosted 'SNL' on Feb. 4, right before the Super Bowl. (Photo: NBC, Will Heath/NBC) 
Here's something you don't expect from a Totino's pizza rolls commercial: a French lesbian love story. 
But that's the turn that Saturday Night Live 's skit takes after a housewife (Vanessa Bayer) meets her husband's friend's sister ( SNL host Kristen Stewart). Instead of serving snacks as planned, the women embrace, spray each other with water, say sweet nothings in French and make out. So, no, the "hungry guys" never get their Totino's. 
The commercial is the third in a series of Super Bowl-timed Totino's parodies SNL has done starring Bayer. 
In 2015, the commercial had a "Super Bowl Activity Pack" that was "full of fun little puzzles and games to keep my mind active," said Bayer. 
In 2016, the ad took a creepy, X Files -style turn when Bayer realized her guys were watching a blank screen. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2kaELdJ Most Popular
